questionTitle: Which of the following operation retrieves the newest version of the object?
questionExplanation: Versioning also can be used for preserving data and for archiving purposes.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Drupal is used in major Web sites and organizes vast amounts of information
questionOption2: Fourspace is often associated with blogging tools
questionOption3: FourSquare works with photos, imports information from other social tools, and allows very attractive Web sites to be created by average users
questionExplanation: Drupal is extensively used and has broad industry impact, and it is a full-strength developer tool.

questionTitle: Which of the following applications are processed locally on the phone?
questionExplanation: Smartphones are essentially miniaturized computers that run locally.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: MobileMe Mail adds a number of features to hosted e-mail including better screen control and formatting, picture handling, and a rich Web experience
questionOption2: MobileMe Calendar is an updated version of the online calendar application
questionOption3: iPhone applications are hosted on the iTunes App Store
questionExplanation: Many applications are heavy users of Internet or Web services and require dedicated infrastructure to stage.

questionTitle: Which of the following application can replay requests to Web servers?
questionExplanation: This tool runs the requests from a single client, which can be a resource limitation of its own.

questionTitle: Which of the following service provider provides the least amount of built in security?
questionExplanation: You get the least amount of built in security with an Infrastructure as a Service provider, and the most with a Software as a Service provider.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the property of the composable component?
questionExplanation: A transaction is executed without regard to other transactions or requests.

questionTitle: Which of the following service allows you to create beautiful, memorable movies?
questionExplanation: Windows Live Movie Maker consists of a PC scanner for viruses, spyware, and other malware.

questionTitle: Amazon Web Services supports ________ Type II Audits.
questionExplanation: Becoming a cloud service provider requires a large investment.

questionTitle: Data stored in __________ domains doesn’t require maintenance of a schema.
questionExplanation: To create a high performance “simple” database, the data store created is flat; that is, it is non-relational and joins are not supported.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: For a cloud-based virtual computer, the network interface may be a highly variable resource
questionOption2: Increasing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the different set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
questionExplanation: Cloud vendor moves virtual systems around on physical systems or reconfigure its network pathways on the fly to accommodate demand.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: A branded cloud computing platform cannot extend customer relationships by offering additional service options
questionOption2: A cloud computing platform extends the company’s products and defends their franchise
questionOption3: The economies of scale cannot make a profitable business
questionExplanation: This is the case for Microsoft’s Windows Azure Platform.

questionTitle: The Windows CE ___ kernel is a suite of Microsoft applications optimized for smaller display size and using the Windows API.
questionExplanation: Microsoft has worked hard to make Windows Mobile devices a natural extension for Windows developers upon which to position their products.

questionTitle: Based on PageRank algorithm, Google returns __________ for a query that is parsed for its keywords.
questionExplanation: SERP stands for Search Engine Results Page.

questionTitle: Which of the following correctly describes group of technologies that leverage HTML and CSS for styling?
questionExplanation: AJAX is a set of development tools that allow for client input into Web applications.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: A deployment model defines the purpose of the cloud and the nature of how the cloud is located
questionOption2: Service model defines the purpose of the cloud and the nature of how the cloud is located
questionOption3: Cloud Square Model is meant to show is that the traditional notion of a network boundary being the network’s firewall no longer applies in cloud computing
questionExplanation: Four types of deployment models exist.

questionTitle: Which of the following service is provided by Google for online storage?
questionExplanation: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service created by Google.

questionTitle: APIs and Deployment are second level application attributes in accordance with ____________
questionExplanation: Deconstructing an application’s critical functionality is only half the process.

questionTitle: Which of the following access control step shown in the following figure is incorrect?
questionExplanation: Access Control allows one application to trust the identity of another application.

questionTitle: SQL Azure is a cloud-based relational database service that is based on ____________
questionExplanation: SQL Azure Database supports Transact-SQL statements.

questionTitle: Which of the following standard is meant to span the different vendors’ standards and cloud infrastructure?
questionExplanation: SNIA and the Open Grid Forum have created a joint working group to create the Open Cloud Computing Interface (OCCI).

questionTitle: Which of the following service creates an application hosting environment?
questionExplanation: AppFabric is a cloud-enabled version of the .NET Framework.

questionTitle: AMI imaging service is provided by Amazon for ______________
questionExplanation: An AMI can be for public use under a free distribution license, for pay-per-use with operating systems such as Windows, or shared by an EC2 user with other users who are given the privilege of access.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: A service in SOMF that is granular and very narrow in scope is referred to as an atomic service
questionOption2: An atomic service can be decomposed into smaller services that provide a useful function
questionOption3: SOA describes a distributed collection of services performing business process functions
questionExplanation: A collection of composite services that would form a process module is referred to as a service cluster.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: MEMS is a class of very small sensor or actuator devices where small mechanical systems are driven by electricity to indicate a position
questionOption2: The incorporation of low-cost geo-sensors in the form of GPS chips into mobile devices opens the mobile user to a whole range of services based on the client’s location
questionOption3: The iPhone uses the proximity sensor to turn the screen off when a user puts the phone to his face
questionExplanation: There are many more contexts that can be used in processing client requests and returning relevant information.

questionTitle: Which does C in FCAPS stand for?
questionExplanation: Your management responsibilities depend on the particular service model for your cloud deployment.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a virtual machine technology now owned by Oracle that can run various operating systems?
questionExplanation: VirtualBox serves as a host for a variety of virtual appliances.

questionTitle: Which of the following action provides a wrapper for metadata and operational instructions?
questionExplanation: In a PUT operation, the container (store) is created if it didn’t exist previously.

questionTitle: Which of the following subject area deals with pay-as-you-go usage model?
questionExplanation: For cloud computing, the pay-as-you-go usage model allows for costs to be applied to individual accounts directly.

questionTitle: A service that concentrates on hardware follows the _________ as a Service model.
questionExplanation: Amazon web service follows PaaS model.
